question:
You have recently started work in a new company.
Write a letter to an English- speaking friend. In your letter  
-  explain why you changed jobs
- describe your new job
- tell him your ither news
text: I hope you are well. Sorry I have not been in touch for such a long time, because I had a very busy month. I am writing to talk about my new job in an international company.

In fact, my previous job had a strained atmosphere and I was not comfortable there. In addition, my colleagues do not have friendly behaviour. For example, one day I forgot to close one of my room's windows, and thus next morning, I had an argument with my coworker. Furthermore, I had to do repetitive tasks every day and it was so boring.

Recently, I am working for a big electrical company and I like my new career. Indeed, it is far better than my last job and has a number of advantages. For instance, I have a higher income, full-payment insurance is considered for me, there is a friendly atmosphere in my workplace, and the most important item for me is that it is a creative career.
Surprisingly, I bought a house in the suburb and we will move there next week. Moreover, we are planning a trip to your city and I wish I could see you.
I am longing to see you again. Give your wife my regards.
